How It Works

Our platform guides you through a simple process to transform your military experience into civilian career success.

1

Translate Your Skills

Enter your military background, and our AI-powered Skill Translator will convert your experience into civilian-friendly terms.

2

Build Your Resume

Use our Resume Generator to create a professional, ATS-friendly resume that highlights your transferable skills.

3

Optimize for ATS

Scan your resume against job descriptions to ensure it passes through Applicant Tracking Systems.

4

Apply With Confidence

Submit your optimized resume to employers knowing it effectively communicates your value.

Success Stories

Hear from veterans who successfully transitioned to civilian careers with our platform.

"After 12 years in the Army, I struggled to explain my experience to civilian employers. The Skill Translator helped me convert my military leadership into terms that resonated with hiring managers. I landed a senior operations role within 2 months!"

Michael R.

Former Army Staff Sergeant

Now: Operations Manager

"The Resume Generator and ATS Scanner were game-changers for me. I went from getting zero callbacks to five interview requests in one week. The platform helped me understand how to position my Navy experience for civilian tech roles."

Jennifer T.

Former Navy IT Specialist

Now: Cybersecurity Analyst

"As a Marine Corps logistics officer, I had valuable skills but didn't know how to market them. This platform helped me identify civilian industries where my experience was in high demand. The ATS Scanner helped me tailor my resume for each application."

David L.

Former Marine Corps Captain

Now: Supply Chain Director
